# Mobile Bookmarks for Field Capture Setup
# Save these to your mobile browser for quick access

# === ONE-TIME SETUP ===
Create PAT:
https://github.com/settings/tokens?type=beta

Add Secret to Repo:
https://github.com/jwade83/career-intelligence-space/settings/secrets/actions/new

# === REGULAR USE ===
View Active PRs:
https://github.com/jwade83/career-intelligence-space/pulls

Create Issue/PR (Copilot):
https://github.com/jwade83/career-intelligence-space

# === MONITORING ===
View Workflow Runs:
https://github.com/jwade83/career-intelligence-space/actions

View Secrets:
https://github.com/jwade83/career-intelligence-space/settings/secrets/actions

# === TROUBLESHOOTING ===
Check Branch Protection:
https://github.com/jwade83/career-intelligence-space/settings/branches

View Workflow Files:
https://github.com/jwade83/career-intelligence-space/tree/main/.github/workflows
